command.name: tp_point
command.description: Item can be: powerups, quad, pent, ring, armor, ra, ya, ga, weapons, lg, rl, gl, sng, ng, ssg, ammo, cells, rockets, nails, shells, players, eyes, teammate, enemy, mh, health, pack, flag, all, default, none, suit Item names can be customized with tp_name_item
